item.description:
Join us for this great summertime paddle and picnic. In addition to the paddle, the park will be hosting the League of NH Craftsmen Annual Craft Fair (www.nhcrafts.org/craftmens_fair/fair_home.html)

This Craft Fair features the beautiful glass work of our own Joe Godek and more than 200 of his fellow craftsmen. Entrance fee for adults to this fair is $10. Come early, check out the crafts and then paddle. Or bring some non-paddling friends to enjoy the craft fair and join us after the paddle for a post paddle picnic. There is a $4.00 day use/boat launch fee at the park.

Launch Time is 1:00 p.m. (give people a chance to enjoy the craft show prior to paddling)

Off the Water by 4:30 p.m.

Post paddle "pot luck" picnic at the beach: 4:30 - 6:30

Paddlers/picnickers should bring one dish to share in a "pot luck" style. BYOB


Mount Sunapee State Park & State Beach
Phone: 603-763-5561

Location: Off Route 103, Newbury and Goshen


Activities: Swimming, picnicking, fishing, boating, hiking, skiing, mountain biking

Amenities: Bathhouse, picnic tables, boat launch, canoe/kyak rentals, chairlift rides, full service ski area

Day Use Fee: $4 for adults; $2 for children ages 6-11; children ages 5 and under and NH residents age 65 and over are admitted free.
item.how_to_find_us: Will meet at the State Beach boat ramp and parking lot
item.name: Mt. Sunapee State Park Beach - Paddle/Craft Fair/Post-Paddle Pot Luck Picnic
